channel.title: Power Automate on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in Power Automate on Blowfish

item.title: Get the SSPList Id and termSetItem Id
item.description: To get the sspListId the following url will display it https://<tenant>.sharepoint.com/sites/<site>/_api/web/lists/getbytitle('<list>')/fields?$filter=InternalName eq '<internalMetadataColumnName>' To get the termSetList Id go to the TermStore Admin Centre There are 2 option to get there

item.title: Sending an HTTP request to SharePoint
item.description: This is my guide for patching SharePoint items using the SharePoint REST API. All code can be copied and pasted into the body. Method, Uri and Headers will need to be different depending on whether you’re creating or updating an item.

item.title: Update Environment Variables
item.description: We all know the scenario, a managed solution has been imported but one of the variables has been set incorrectly. How do I go and update this to the correct value?
